channel.title: Need help at item switching on a delta base :O slotsaving thingy
channel.description:
hello i got the next problem: every time i switch a item it goes on the top of my inventory how i get hybrid switching or slotsaving?
it's a 317 delta base
thanks anyways

item.title: Need help at item switching on a delta base :O slotsaving thingy
item.dc:creator: @JamesMayyte JamesMayyte
item.description:
@JamesMayyte wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:2, topic:371964”]ip:

Client folder->gui->‘control+f’ search for ‘ip’ or ‘127.0’
Then change that ip with yours
Im not sure how 2 change the port,cant see why you would want to!?!?!?

everytime you switch an item…what?!
i suggest improving the grammar.[/quote]

I’m also sure you dont need to change the port

Read full topic
